record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - December 12, 2007)

[Page: S15372]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that a member of my staff, Dave Frederickson, who is my agriculture staff person from Minnesota and former head of the National Farmers Union, be granted floor privileges for the remainder of the farm bill debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
